AltName.entry: COMMUNITY LEGAL ADVICE SERVICE FOR SOUTH YORKSHIRE LTD

Desc.entry: A consortium of not-for-profit independent advice providers whose mission is to create and maintain a sustainable network of responsive, high quality advice providers in Sheffield's not-for-profit sector, with particular focus on advice and social welfare law. It's key aims are: To provide a high quality, consistent and sustainable advice service to Sheffield's disadvantaged communities of place and interest; To build a partnership structure that can take advantage of tendering/funding opportunities and manage funds, once secured, in the most efficient and cost effective manner. The consortium has 28 full members and one associate member and includes Citizens Advice Bureaux, Law Centre and 22 independent advice agencies affiliated to AdviceUK. Company limited by guarantee no 06254599. Please note: CLASSY does not provide advice direct to the general public.
